wikipedia_page.main: Sheila Shribman  is a British pediatrician. Shribman was most notable for the successful integration of children's services in hospital, community and mental health settings, working closely with the local authority. She was named a Commander of the Order of the British Empire during the 2011 New Year Honours and awarded the James Spence Medal in 2012.

response: * Dr Sheila Shribman, doctor, national clinical director for children.
